thread.title: San Diego Corporate Housing Leader, Key Housing Announces Featured Apartment Community for October, 2015
thread.title_full: San Diego Corporate Housing Leader, Key Housing Announces Featured Apartment Community for October, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: San Diego Corporate Housing Leader, Key Housing Announces Featured Apartment Community for October, 2015
text:
Key Housing, one of San Diego’s top-rated corporate housing services, announces its featured apartment community for October, 2015. Quality already-furnished, San Diego corporate housing is difficult to find with the expanding economy, in the region’s tight housing market.
San Diego, CA
Key Housing, a top-rated corporate housing service for the San Diego area, is proud to announce their October, 2015, featured apartment community: Avalon Fashion Valley. By selecting a featured apartment community in San Diego, Key Housing is helping those people looking for corporate housing to find quality housing in what is one of the tightest apartment markets in the United States.
“San Diego is the confluence of so many good things, it has an embarrassment of riches. Indeed, it has achieved the status of a the ‘perfect storm’, except in the good way.” explained Bob Lee, President of Key Housing. “The climate and location could hardly be improved on, and appeals to employees. The proximity to Pacific Rim business and trade appeals to the CFO. The dense concentration of Navy-related activity is just icing on the cake. All of this means that many people are seeking San Diego corporate housing, and the market is tight. Therefore, we have selected one of our most impressive partners to be featured in October.”
The featured apartment community for October, 2015, is Avalon Fashion Valley. Interested parties can view the property at http://www.keyhousing.com/rightside.asp?action=form3&ID=San+Diego . It is located at 7084 Friars Road, San Diego, California.
To browse other available corporate housing please visit http://www.keyhousing.com/GMcontact.asp?location=853 . At both locations, one can easily browse a plethora of available short-term housing for corporate renters available in the city.
Exciting Features of October’s Featured Corporate Housing Community
Avalon Fashion Valley should be the first stop for anyone looking for well-appointed living in San Diego corporate housing apartments. These luxury San Diego apartments boast multiple floor plans, crafted to be a match to a variety of lifestyles. Spacious and open designs feature plenty of room to entertain or relax, and a wide variety of high-end amenities from a gourmet kitchen with granite counters and pecan finish cabinetry to extra-large walk-in closets to accommodate a full wardrobe, both business and casual wear. Of course there are also basics such as a full-size washer and dryer in each home. Signature community amenities include a spectacular sparkling outdoor pool and lounge with fireplace, barbecue area, lush courtyards, a state of the art fitness center and resident lounge with a full game room. A professional service team will ensure that everything you need will be promptly provided at this featured San Diego corporate housing.
Availabilities for corporate renters cannot be guaranteed; however, Key Housing has many other available opportunities in the hot San Diego and Southern California rental market. Interested parties are recommended to either use the website, or contact Key Housing directly for personal assistance with their San Diego temporary housing needs.
About Key Housing
Based in Folsom, California, Key Housing Connections Inc. specializes in corporate housing and corporate housing in large cities like San Francisco, Los Angeles or San Diego as well as smaller cities like Palo Alto, La Jolla, and Venice Beach. Key Housing is a leader in affordable, friendly, short-term and corporate housing housing in places like San Jose, San Francisco and even Los Angeles, and just about every city in California. Whether it's serviced apartments or a furnished rental, just search, click or call today!
Key Housing
(800) 989-0410
http://www.keyhousing.com/
